recurring_orders.subscription_subheading: Get fresh pairs of awesome socks each month.
recurring_orders.gift_message_prompt_html: Personalize your gift with a free message!
recurring_orders.gift_message_placeholder_html: ENTER YOUR MESSAGE HERE. (BE SURE TO INCLUDE WHO THE GIFT IS FROM!)
recurring_orders.limited_edition_description_html: Occasionally we include limited edition socks in your subscription like no-shows, wool socks in the winter, knee-highs for the ladies, and so on. Sound good?
recurring_orders.summary_please_make_a_selection_html: Please select a style, quantity and payment option

prepaid_subscription_will_cause_cart_cle.one: NOTE: Prepaid subscriptions must be processed individually. By clicking checkout, the item already in your cart will be removed.
prepaid_subscription_will_cause_cart_cle.other: NOTE: Prepaid subscriptions must be processed individually. By clicking checkout, the {{ count }} items already in your cart will be removed.

recurring_orders.subscription_expires_html: Your subscription will end after the last shipment
recurring_orders.subscription_auto_renews_html: Your subscription will end after the last shipment
recurring_orders.promo_offer_title_html: Have a promo code? Enter it here!
recurring_orders.promo_offer_message: Congratulations!  You will be receiving a free gift with your first shipment! (Limit 1 per mailing address)
recurring_orders.promo_offer_invalid_html:
Invalid Promo Code
Note: Coupon codes are entered at checkout
recurring_orders.login_prompt_html:
Good news! We've upgraded our site and will be announcing some cool new features very soon.

All subscriptions created before May 18, 2018 will continue as normal. However, if you need to view or make changes to your existing subscription, click here.

If you'd like to create a new subscription, get started by creating a new account below.

For any assistance, please email us at info@sockfancy.com. Thanks!

existing_subscription.subscription_page_existing_sub_header_ht: Looks like you've already got a subscription in your cart!
existing_subscription.subscription_page_existing_sub_message_h: We can only ship to one place at a time - finish creating the subscription you've already got, then come back here if you need to set up a gift for another sock lover
existing_subscription.product_page_existing_sub_message_html: This pair of socks will arrive with the first order in your subscription
